description: Try our easy to follow Pork & Fennel Sausages With Fresh Tomato Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pork & Fennel Sausages With Fresh Tomato Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cloves garlic, grated or finely chopped
4 slices thick slices Italian-style crusty ciabatta, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Put the sausages in a shallow glass or ceramic dish. Add the olive oil, garlic, and dill, and season with a little salt and black pepper. Stir the sausages around so that they are well coated. Cover with cling film, and leave to marinate in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour.
Meanwhile, to make the salsa, combine all the ingredients in a bowl, and mix well. Season with salt and black pepper.
Heat a grill or barbecue, or a heavy frying pan, until hot. Grill the sausages for 10-15 minutes until cooked through, turning halfway during cooking to brown both sides.
Divide the sausages between 4 serving plates, and serve on a piece of toasted ciabatta, with the tomato salsa spooned over. Serve immediately.
